definition: handle or shaft (of an axe etc)/(of a flower, leaf or fruit) stem/sth that affords an advantage to an opponent/classifier for knives or blades
hand drill with a crank handle

sentences.english: Affix using one of the crank arm fixing bolts.
sentences.chinese: 詞綴使用其中的一個曲柄臂固定螺栓。

sentences.english: The pedals of a cycle are attached to a crank.
sentences.chinese: 自行車的踏板與曲柄相連。

sentences.english: Lifted the tank, disconnected the breather hose that goes from the airbox to the crank.
sentences.chinese: 把油箱，斷開呼吸軟管，都從盒與曲柄。

sentences.english: A mechanical model for calculating the strength of the crank pin on pumping units is established by a rotary coordinate.
sentences.chinese: 採用動座標系建立了曲柄銷強度計算的力學模型。

sentences.english: Re install the crank to airbox hose, and button everything back up.
sentences.chinese: 你安裝曲柄盒軟管，和按鈕所有的東西帶回來。

sentences.english: Shaking screen on crank-connecting rod for reciprocating motion to the sieve case.
sentences.chinese: 搖動篩依靠曲柄連桿機構使篩箱作往復運動。

sentences.english: The rotation speed of crank and air flow speed are the main factors.
sentences.chinese: 其主次因素順序爲曲柄轉速和風扇進風口風速。

sentences.english: He started to crank the engine.
sentences.chinese: 他開始用曲柄啓動動發機。

sentences.english: Double crank four ring-plate-type cycloid drive is a new-type drive.
sentences.chinese: 雙曲柄四環板式針擺行星傳動是一種新型傳動。

sentences.english: Wind-Stop with automatic lock. RH and LH application.
sentences.chinese: 帶自動鎖的曲柄式止動器，左右門均適用。

sentences.english: Long cranks and Low gearing for lots of leverage and slow speed.
sentences.chinese: 龍曲柄和低負債的大量的槓桿和速度緩慢。

sentences.english: A purist form of unicycle, without cranks.
sentences.chinese: 一種最純粹的形式獨輪車，無曲柄。

sentences.english: Contains an aluminum finned crankcase and balanced flywheel.
sentences.chinese: 還包含一個鋁製曲柄箱和平衡飛輪。

sentences.english: Nestled inside a wooden bucket, there's a metal canister with a hand crank on top.
sentences.chinese: 內置木桶，頂部是一個金屬的曲柄搖手。

sentences.english: This paper has used analytics to design Plane crank-rocker mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 採用幾何解析法設計平面曲柄搖桿機構。

sentences.english: Another shot of the Turbine cranks.

definition: nut (female component of nut and bolt)
